actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill authorizing title to certain reservation land to be taken in trust.

summary.text: Authorizes the United States to take in trust for an Indian borrower title to land within an Indian reservation when such land is purchased by an Indian of the tribe of that reservation with funds borrowed from the Farmers Home Administration.

titles.title: A bill authorizing title to certain reservation land to be taken in trust.
